name: Hearty Turkey Stew with Vegetables
author: PIPPYMOE
summary: Turkey breast meat and fresh vegetables are cooked up into a hearty stew that may be enjoyed any time of year.
ingredients: 1 stalk celery, cut into 1 inch pieces
2  carrots, peeled and sliced into 1 inch pieces
2  skinless, boneless turkey breast halves, cubed
directions: Melt the butter in a pot over medium heat
Place onions in the pot and cook until tender
Stir in celery and carrots, and cook until tender
Stir in the potatoes and flour
Pour in the chicken stock, and season soup with marjoram
Place turkey in the pot, and bring to a boil
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer 30 minutes
Mix the green bell pepper into the soup, and continue cooking 10 minutes, until pepper is tender
